title: Two-week ’work from home’ for public servants from next week
body_lines: A two-week period of work-from-home has been declared for public servants by the government from June 20, 2022.

The circular issued by the Public Administration Ministry Secretary said that the relevant ministry Secretary, department head or heads of the institution have been authorised to summon the minimum number of staff required to maintain public services without interruption.
As per the circular, even when minimum staff members are summoned for duty, it should be done on shift basis or on any other regular mechanism.
The circular also says that the Public servants should be ready to work online whenever they are not summoned to work in the office.
